seo.title: Vijay Wade - Agile Coach & Founder
seo.description: Founder at AgileWaters Consulting and Recrui8. Agile coach and leadership mentor helping teams build better products.

contact.status: Currently based in India. Open for Agile Consulting and Senior PO roles.

content.emphasis: Agility is about people, not processes.
content.paragraph: I focus on enabling teams to think clearly, collaborate effectively, and deliver outcomes instead of just outputs.
My work bridges leadership, execution, and continuous improvement. I believe real transformation happens when clarity meets accountability.

projects.title: Enterprise Agile Transformation
projects.description: Led an end-to-end Agile transformation for a mid-to-large enterprise, aligning leadership, teams, and delivery practices.
projects.focus: Organizational agility, leadership alignment, Scrum & Kanban adoption
projects.outcome: Improved delivery predictability, faster release cycles, and stronger cross-team collaboration.

projects.title: Product Delivery & Execution Coaching
projects.description: Coached product managers and engineering teams to improve product discovery, prioritization, and execution.
projects.focus: Product management, backlog refinement, outcome-driven delivery
projects.outcome: Clearer product roadmaps, reduced waste, and improved customer-focused outcomes.

projects.title: Agile Leadership Enablement
projects.description: Worked with senior leaders to build an Agile mindset focused on empowerment, accountability, and continuous improvement.
projects.focus: Agile leadership, team empowerment, decision-making clarity
projects.outcome: Leaders enabled teams instead of controlling them, resulting in higher engagement and ownership.

experience.description: Leading Agile consulting, coaching teams and organizations on agile transformation, leadership, and delivery excellence.
Focused on structured hiring, talent assessment, and industryâ€“academia collaboration.

Worked with multiple organizations as an Agile Coach, enabling teams to adopt Agile practices, improve collaboration, and deliver value consistently. Coached Scrum Masters, Product Owners, and engineering teams while supporting leadership in building an Agile mindset.

Led cross-functional teams as a Delivery Lead and Scrum Master, facilitating Agile ceremonies, improving delivery predictability, and supporting teams in continuous improvement. Acted as a bridge between business stakeholders and engineering teams.

recommendations.name: Mohit Agrawal
recommendations.content: I got an opportunity though a short one to work with Vijay @ BNYM Technology (Inautix). It was a great learning experience for me since Vijay has a vast experience helping different companies across multiple domains on there Agile journey. His ability to connect with different age group kept amazing me. Whether it is working with stakeholders, PO or scrum masters. Vijay is also an effective trainer on various Agile frameworks like Kanban, Scrum, Nexus etc. Looking forward to working with you again. Wishing you the very best for all your future and present endeavors.

recommendations.name: Miranda FOUCAULT
recommendations.content: Vijay facilitated the main session of our recent seminar with the leadership team. The whole experience from preparation to wrap-up went very smoothly. The way he designed the workshop and set-up the room as a kanban enabled us to stay focused on our end-goal. His facilitation style is very pleasant, he brings good en-ergy and gives a lot of importance to the stakeholders. It was a pleasure working with him!

recommendations.name: Nelson Navas
recommendations.content: Vijay is very knowledgeable in agile and software development methodologies, with a wealth of experience to share. I recommend Vijay as a trainer, facilitator, and consultant.

recommendations.name: John Cheetham
recommendations.content: Our teams attended Agile Training presented by Vijay Wade. We already include many Agile characteristics in our software development cycle. Vijay gave us many ways to improve our process. I hope to soon make changes based on this training.

recommendations.name: Joel S.
recommendations.role: Digital transformation Fanatic, Market Place Prophet and Agile Evangelist
recommendations.content: I attended and Participated in Kanban training KMP 1 and 2. Vijay is a very seasoned professional with lot of experience under his belt and is able to connect his trainees with real time scenarios as he masterfully goes through the course content and keep you engaged in the class throughout. I highly recommend Vijay for his training. He also is a great guy to talk too. Highly recommend any training from Vijay. Thanks Vijay!

recommendations.name: Volker Glaeske
recommendations.company: Driving Agile Business Operations, IT Strategy, and Culture Transformation
recommendations.content: Vijay has got a very broad knowledge of all agile practices and is one of the best Kanban trainers that I came across in my professional life. I had a great learning experience during the Kanban workshop, thanks to his engaging personality and his excellent communication skills. He is able to visualise the key concepts of Kanban and can always support them with real-life examples due to his profound working experience.

recommendations.name: Muhammad F. Sinaga
recommendations.role: Head of AI @ Google Cloud Indonesia | Generative AI Specialist | Business Analytics Expert | Enterprise Agile Coach & Trainer @ SAFeÂ® | Doctorate Degree in IT (UK) | 330+ Certificates
recommendations.content: Vijay Wade proved to be one of the most committed Kanban professionals that I have ever met. He amazed me with his practical insights and unique training methods to solving various Kanban problems. Vijay Wade is an experienced and accountable Kanban Trainer and he maintains good relations with his past clients. I learned Kanban a lot from him and I do hope to be able to take further Kanban training sessions with him in the future. I certainly would recommend Vijay for your Kanban training needs.

recommendations.name: Sumit Pawar
recommendations.content: I attended Vijay's KSD course. Vijay has in-depth knowledge of the subject and explains problem very clearly relating it with multiple real life use cases from his experience. His classes are always full of learnings and lot of take aways. His teaching methodology maps with the course content very accurately. I would really recommend Vijay for anyone looking for Kanban or starting with agile methodology.

recommendations.name: Arjun Nehra
recommendations.content: I recently attended a Kanban virtual class given by Vijay. I was very impressed by the way he conducted the virtual sessions and how he kept the class fully engaged throughout. He was extremely good at giving real-life examples for explaining the Kanban concepts. And, we spent almost half of the class doing Simulations and practices exercises which really crystallized the concept of "Flow" for me. Vijay's class exceeded my ex-pectations. :) Thanks a lot Vijay!

recommendations.name: Mahendra Yadav
recommendations.role: Senior Software Engineer at ServiceNow | Full Stack Developer
recommendations.content: Vijay has a very unique teaching skill. we attended his Scrum training session in which he has used different ways to pass on the knowledge through fun activities instead of presentations.

recommendations.name: Ravi Bhim
recommendations.content: At the core, Agile boils down to a few core concepts - Estimating the tasks, Operational Discipline, Team Dynamics, Iterative Mindset, etc... Vijay has helped us understand how these concepts have a direct effect on the eventual success of the team through practical approaches such as games and discussions. These learnings are going to stick with me because of the way they were delivered - and thats why Vijay is the real deal.

recommendations.name: Ajitesh Prakash
recommendations.role: Project and Delivery Management | Scrum Master and Agile Coach | SAFe Agilist | Kanban and Lean evangelist
recommendations.content: Got a chance to be a part of SAFe 5.0 training conducted by Vijay. I appreciate the knowledge that he has around Agile, Lean, SAFe, Kanban and DevOps. He has been around, seen the changing times in the Agile world and his understanding of the subject speaks volumes about his experience. Very patient with all the queries, he would always listen to the other point of view before nudging you in the right direction. His passion to educate people on these topics is illustrated by how he kept the training engaging for a period of 2 days and kept everyone on their toes. I would definitely recommend Vijay for any agile education.

recommendations.name: Yash Todi
recommendations.content: I was fortunate to receive a two day training from Mr. Vijay at BeautifulCode, Hyderabad. The learning was fun and I am not sure if 'training' would be the appropriate term to describe it. The theory sessions were very interactive and the games that followed every session vindicated the theories. By the end of the second day our thought process was deeply influenced and the lessons learnt. I would request him to keep up the good work and wish him all the very best for his future endeavours.

recommendations.name: Pranav Kumar PB
recommendations.content: I attended SCRUM & Agile 2 day training from Vijay. He made the learning experience very fun and activity oriented. Really loved his approach of teaching. His grip on the subjects of scrum, agile and kanban are extraordinary. He helped us break a lot of assumptions we had about being agile. I'll be using the skills he taught throughout my carrer.

recommendations.name: Subrahmaniam S.R.V
recommendations.role: Build High Performance Culture & Unleash Innovation: Your Transformation Partner
recommendations.content: I have had the pleasure of working with Vijay - first in Siemens and then in an other coaching engagement as a fellow coach. Just around the time world Scaling was getting famous in the Agile World; Vijay and his team in Siemens were practicing CI @ Scale in their large agile program. That was in 2013. Then I got to work with him closely in the coaching engagement and that is where I saw his soft skills usage at its best. Patient / Persuasive / Persevering to help get teams better.

recommendations.name: Sachin Nirmal
recommendations.role: VP | Senior Release Train Engineer at BNY | Data & Analytics Solutions
recommendations.content: Vijay worked with me as a Agile Coach. As we were already following Scrum development in our project, he initially worked with us and observed the way in which we work. After that he provided some valuable feedback which helped me to conduct scrum effectively. I especially liked his way to gel within the team and identify any issues which are hampering team's performance. He is also master in conducting Sprint Retrospectives. He has lot of tools and techniques which he describes to the team during retrospective. It helps team to identify any impediments and see if there is any way to improve the performance. Wishing him all the best for his future endeavors !!
